title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 about neural machine translation (NMT) using pre-training methods

Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 about neural machine translation (NMT) using pre-training methods. These articles cover various aspects of pre-training in NMT, including pre-training objectives, pre-training techniques, and their applications
Neural Machine Translation by Jointly Learning to Align and Translate
- This seminal paper introduced the idea of pre-training an NMT model using a sequence-to-sequence architecture
Neural Machine Translation by Jointly Learning to Align and Translate
- This follow-up paper further explores the use of pre-training in NMT, including the introduction of the attention mechanism
Neural Machine Translation by Jointly Learning to Align and Translate
- This paper introduces the concept of sequence-level objectives, such as sequence-level loss and sequence-level alignment, to improve NMT performance
